attributes.action: stop anti drug adverts being called h.e.m.p   marijuana
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop anyone in the uk from making an anti drug advert and calling it Heroin
                                Ecstasy
                                Marijuana
                                Pot      
this can cause problems with the legal industrial hemp trade in the uk by associating legal industrial hemp with drugs

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
